extendedInfo.description: CPMA Middle School (CPMA MS) gives quick access to key information for Creative, Performing, Media Arts Magnet Middle School. It features user-friendly, bright buttons to give instant access to the most useful information to keep users up-to-date about school AND class happenings.It is also a benchmark for how a school can use an app to reach a broader range of people, and can guarantee contact with members of a schools population through push-notifications and app-tracking.  The source code is available as an open source project on GitHub.  You may view the files see how you or your students can set up a similar app for your school**Access teacher information such as class websites, email addresses and important policies for the school**Teachers grouped by department, last name and key words**Office staff grouped by department, along with description of job duties**Virtual planner pages with school policies explained**Access ParentConnect, StudentConnect, or the main website directly through the app**Map gives you directions to school campus from any location

reviews.comment: Great app. Can\'t wait to see it evolve.
reviews.author: Aaron Rubin
